con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="RegistrationServiceWSDL" targetNamespace="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService" xmlns:ref="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService:ref" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService"> <xsd:import namespace="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService:ref" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8081/services/registration?xsd=RegistrationServices.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RegistrationResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ref:RegisterResponse" name="outputParameter"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RegistrationRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ref:RegisterInput" name="inputParameter"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="RegistrationServiceWSDL"> <wsdl:operation name="Register"> <wsdl:input message="tns:RegistrationRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:RegistrationResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RegistrationServiceWSDLSOAP" type="tns:RegistrationServiceWSDL"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="Register"> <soap:operation soapAction="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService/Register"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="RegistrationServiceWSDL"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:RegistrationServiceWSDLSOAP" name="RegistrationServiceWSDLSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8081/services/registration"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService:ref" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="uri:dhenton9000:registrationService:ref"> <element name="RegisterInput"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="name" type="string"/> <element name="password" type="string"/> <element ref="tns:registrationDetails"/> <element name="registrationDate" type="dateTime"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="registrationDetails"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="paymentPlan" type="string"/> <element name="months" type="integer"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="RegisterResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="responseInformation" type="string"/> <element name="currentTime" type="dateTime"/> <element name="totalCost" type="decimal"/> <element name="paymentDepartment" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </schema>
